regen.absent_element: automatic adjustment of preset limits when control is transferred between systems
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall automatically adjust the AV preset limits when control is transferred to or from another TCS to ensure efficient and safe UAV operations.

regen.absent_element: automatic adjustment of preset limits when transferring control between systems
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall automatically adjust the preset limits when control of an AV is transferred to or from another TCS to ensure efficient and safe UAV operations.

regen.absent_element: action to take when UAV exceeds preset limits
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically adjust or restrict the UAV's flight parameters when exceeding preset limits and alert the operator.

label: TCS shall notify the operator when AV performance parameters are out of limits.
absence: action of notifying the operator when AV performance parameters are out of limits.
